title: 8-year-old shot still in critical condition
content:
BUFFALO, NY - Buffalo Police say an eight-year-old boy was shot on South Division Street late Thursday night.
Officers responded to the call just after 10:00 p.m. Investigators say the boy, Donnell Bibbes, was struck by gunfire while sitting in a vehicle with his mother and two older brothers.
Police say a suspect ran up to the vehicle and fire 10-15 shots into the vehicle, striking the eight-year-old. No one else was hit.
Buffalo Police Commissioner Daniel Derenda says one of child's brothers was the intended target of the shooting.
